brand_identity.name: Flux IDE
brand_identity.description: A production-grade real-time collaborative IDE with a high-precision 'Control Room' aesthetic.
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix IDE utility with HUD/Cockpit aesthetics
Emotion First: Feel like a pilot, not just a coder
Content is King: Code is the hero, UI is the cockpit
Zoom In: Focus on the active line/cursor
Negative Space: Don't clutter the editor
Contrast: High contrast for syntax, subtle for UI

typography.strategy: The 'Swiss Brutalist' (Tech / Art) - Modified for IDE

headings.usage: Panel titles, modal headers, landing page hero

body.usage: UI labels, file tree, settings, menus

code.usage: Editor content, terminal output, debug values

rules: UI Labels (tiny) must be Uppercase + tracking-widest
Line height: Tight (1.1) for headings, Relaxed (1.6) for body

primary.name: Signal Orange
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, active tab indicators, focus rings

accent_1.name: Acid Green
accent_1.usage: Success states, git additions, online status

accent_2.name: Electric Blue
accent_2.usage: Info states, selection highlight, remote cursors

rules: Never use pure black (#000000) for surfaces, only for background if needed for contrast.
Text on dark backgrounds must be #E5E5E5 (90%) or #A3A3A3 (60%), never pure white.

grid_system.editor: Flexbox with Resizable Panels (Split.js or similar logic)
grid_system.spacing: Compact for editor (p-2, gap-1), Generous for landing (p-12, gap-8)

containers.modal: bg-neutral-950 border border-white/10 shadow-2xl shadow-black/50 rounded-xl

buttons.primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white font-medium rounded-md px-4 py-2 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(249,115,22,0.3)] transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 text-white border border-white/10 rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-white/5 text-neutral-400 hover:text-white rounded-md px-2 py-1 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-black/20 border border-white/10 focus:border-orange-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-orange-500/20 rounded-md px-3 py-2 text-sm text-white placeholder:text-neutral-600 transition-all

cards.style: bg-neutral-900/40 border border-white/5 hover:border-white/10 transition-colors rounded-lg p-4

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to reduce banding

avatars.description: User 1 Avatar - Professional male with mask

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Flux IDE' theme with the Signal Orange primary color.
Use 'Chivo' for all headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for UI text.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for the Monaco Editor instance.
Ensure the layout is responsive but optimized for desktop (IDE usage).
Use the provided avatar URLs for the collaborative user list.
Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard.
Use Shadcn UI components but override the default styling to match the 'Obsidian' and 'Signal Orange' theme.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors with subtle borders.
Ensure high contrast for syntax highlighting in the editor.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
